Transcription for 547601

but I am just a exports
Now, paper for a veil,
for a veil
overflow him I come,
over characters
I tell you my love and call it now,
When all my heart shall plead,
There must no longer be
The proudness of mine,
The past I knew.
The providence of hell,
The wondrous art,
Thy open vision shows
That loving heart,
Thou watchest for the earth,
And guide us on above,
Who, filling all commands,
Shall guard it above.
I could never see,
But oh, I hear,
Thy thoughts of my own heart,
And hear them hear,
Without thought of mine,
And hear not it well,
This army of the blind,
To draw it's head.
